subtitle: The mild sweetness of the coriander accentuates that of the carrot, creating the wonderful flavour in this recipe.

method.text: Melt the butter in a large saucepan. Add onion and fry gently for 5 min until softened and slightly coloured. Add the carrots and fry for 2-3 min stirring frequently.

Stir in the flour and allow to cook for 1-2 min. Gradually stir in the stock. Bring to the boil, stirring continuously, to thicken. Add seasoning, coriander, bay leaf and lemon juice. Cover and simmer for 30 min or until carrots are tender.
Remove and discard the bay leaf. Puree the soup in a blender, in batches if necessary.
Return the puree to a clean pan. Add the milk and bring to the boil. Reduce heat, adjust the seasoning, and stir in the cream.

title: Carrot and coriander soup
